snippet: Richard E. Mourdock, the state treasurer, leads Senator Richard G. Lugar in the latest poll of likely Republican primary voters, 48 percent to 38 percent.
abstract: Richard E. Mourdock, the state treasurer, leads Senator Richard G. Lugar in the latest poll of likely Republican primary voters, 48 percent to 38 percent.

headline.main: Lugar Behind in Indiana Senate Race, Poll Shows
